# Magecraft (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, F

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 day

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Eberron Campaign Setting (WotC), pg. 113

You get a +5 competence bonus on one [[Craft (Skill)|Craft]] check representing a day of work crafting an item or [[Spellcraft (Skill)|Spellcraft]] (for the purpose of magical crafting) check. If you cast this spell every day for a week, you can make a [[Craft (Skill)|Craft]] check representing the weekâ€™s work and still gain the +5 competence bonus.

**Focus:** The tools and other equipment normally required to use the [[Craft (Skill)|Craft]] skill to which you apply the bonus.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:*  Change '[[Craft (Skill)|Craft]] check representing a day of work crafting an item' to '[[Craft (Skill)|Craft]] check representing a day of work crafting an item or [[Spellcraft (Skill)|Spellcraft]] (for the purpose of magical crafting) check.'

**Source:** Eberron Campaign Setting Errata 2nd printing, WotC message boards 2007
